column4: so anybody knows what might have broken the 2d acceleration in the new kernel?
so i should compile my own? no i'm using the binary
happened to me too.. ati sucks
and you got it to work? could you tell me how?
so.. i dug my old nvidia card out of curious,, and not only it runs my games.. but xgl/compiz ran nicely on it too
but your on a laptop... so you can do that...
damn, it's built into my laptop, so i have no chance of replacing it. but XGL/Compiz runs fine here too
i think its a kernel thing
hmmm i wonder if xgl will run on my ati card.. too?
are you usin the opensource drivers?
i guess you could compile.. but I try to never recommend that..
i really dont know. I stay away compiling
and I dont know if it will solve your problem.. so i wont recommend doing so
but if you wanna try.. dont let me stop you
no i can't afford breaking my system now. but the 2.6.17 kernel does look good:D
